channel.title: CVE Feed for Weblizar -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Weblizar -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-49280|2024-10-17T19:37:56.500Z -- weblizar -- lightbox%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20lightbox%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Weblizar Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery: from n/a through 1.10.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-38756|2024-08-13T10:30:56.151Z -- weblizar -- coming%20soon
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Weblizar Coming Soon allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Coming Soon: from n/a through 1.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-33911|2024-05-02T11:10:19.104Z -- weblizar -- school%20management%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-33911|2024-07-17T18:44:48.571Z -- weblizar -- school%20management%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-33911|2024-08-02T02:42:59.811Z -- weblizar -- school%20management%20pro
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Weblizar School Management Pro.This issue affects School Management Pro: from n/a through 10.3.4.

item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Weblizar Coming Soon allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Coming Soon: from n/a through 1.6.3.
